comment.author: 97407021@N02
comment._content:
Somewhere in this photograph is my great great grandfather: Sapper James Elliott Scott serial number 10357.
All my existing documents confirm this was his company if anyone can help identify him please send me an email cscott351@gmail.com

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/97407021@N02] Good luck with your research, your g g grandfather's enlistment number is very close to those men identified in this photograph. Have you tried the unit history?. Best of luck :)
